title: Trade Spotlight | What should investors do with Ipca Labs, Tanla Platforms, RCF, Indiabulls Housing... - Moneycontrol
content: Trade Spotlight | What should investors do with Ipca Labs, Tanla Platforms, RCF, Indiabulls Housing...  Moneycontrol
description: Traders should trade with a positive bias and look to buy Ipca Labs in the range of Rs 1,060-1,050 for a potential target of Rs 1,130 in the short term. One should place a stop-loss below Rs 1,020 on the positions.
